modShortDescription: Changes the Forgetting Elixir from a re-spec mod to one that removes your death penalty.
modDescription:
Changes the Forgetting Elixir from a re-spec mod to one that removes your death penalty.

## Note

* This makes choosing points much important. Also, for servers that allow T6 player crafted items, this prevents people from re-specing just to make all T6 items for each item type.

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/DayhawkSilverstar/7DaysToDieMods/tree/master/Dayhawks%20Forgetting%20Death%20Elixir)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/21381-a19-dayhawks-modlets/).

**Credits:** [Dayhawk](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/dayhawk/)
